committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A joint resolution to authorize the Go For Broke National Veterans Association to establish a memorial to Japanese-American War Veterans in the District of Columbia or its environs, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Go for Broke National Veterans Association to establish a memorial on Federal land in the District of Columbia or its environs to honor Japanese-American War Veterans. Prohibits any Federal funds from being used to pay any expense of the establishment of the memorial.

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize the Go For Broke National Veterans Association to establish a memorial to Japanese-American War Veterans in the District of Columbia or its environs, and for other purposes.
